credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Yume no Ukihashi (Floating Bridge of Dreams)
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: Three Japanese masks looking towards center of poster, one at left, one at top center, and one at bottom. Behind masks, a collage of imagery including red flames, architectural motifs, skeletons, demons and mountain scenes.
name: Poster
